name: properties_get_running_costs
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool zoopla_v2.
Tool description: This API helps to query for properties for rent, sale in UK to create a real estate site/application such as zoopla.com
API description: Fetch the running costs associated with a given property listing from Zoopla API.

listing_id.description: The ID of the property listing returned from the /properties/list endpoint.

category.description: The category of the property. Either 'residential' or 'commercial'. Default is 'residential'.

section.description: The section of the property. Either 'for-sale' or 'to-rent'. Default is 'to-rent'.
